overview: Lesbian Farewells is a twisted tale involving lovers and lusters...Sometimes that lead to precious beginnings, continuations, and bitter farewells. Breaking up is hard, but it's not always forever. Jenna J Ross and Staci Silverstone grace the cover of this display of realistic sex! Lesbian Farewells also features Penny Pax, Aiden Starr, Vicki Chase, Sativa Rose, Sovereign Syre, and Dana DeArmond!
title: Lesbian Farewells
